title: Emily Chantiri
text:
Emily Chantiri is an Australian <a href="freelance%20journalist">freelance journalist</a>, <a href="author">author</a> and <a href="finance">finance</a> writer.
Chantiri has written about <a href="personal%20finance">personal finance</a> for over a decade and achieved success as a co-author of the best-selling book "The Money Club". She has two other books that have appeared on the best-sellers list in Australia. She currently writes for "<a href="The%20Sydney%20Morning%20Herald">The Sydney Morning Herald</a>" newspaper and also writes a number of columns for other various Australian publications. She also specializes in travel, management and property.
Chantiri recently published a book, "The Voice of Intuition".
